# loadFactoryPreset(_:)

**Instance Method**

Configures the audio unit as a reverb preset.

## Declaration

```swift
func loadFactoryPreset(_ preset: AVAudioUnitReverbPreset)
```

## Parameters

- **preset**: The reverb preset.

## Discussion

For more information about possible values, see [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioUnitReverbPreset]. The default value is [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioUnitReverbPreset/mediumHall].

## Configure the reverb

- **AVAudioUnitReverbPreset**: Constants that represent preset reverbs.
